meta.name: TopKnotz
meta.description: TopKnotz is an adrenaline-fuelled power trip across the waters of the South Pacific hosted by an all-star lineup including: Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer, culinary expert Miguel Maestre, professional surfer Felicity Palmateer, veteran stuntman Rob Palmer, and seasoned presenter Tom Williams.This new series follows the five fearless hosts as they dive headfirst into the world of marine leisure, tackle extreme challenges and wild stunts, and encounter hilarious mishaps along the way.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: The Topknotz crew blasts off in a thrilling Jet Sprint boat ride. Tom teaches Rob surfboat rowing, where Rob is violently ejected. Grant tours a luxury superyacht. Later, Rob attempts a world record by being towed on a donut tube.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Our five hosts head to Fiji for an epic dive adventure. Rob & Tom catch up with Judy Johnson, a kiwi ocean swimmer, who became a global internet sensation after swimming with a family of Orcas. Grant, Flick & Rob review the Awake Jetboard.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: The TopKnotz team battles treacherous New Zealand rapids on a giant inflatable unicorn. They receive a MƒÅori welcome and participate in a haka. Miguel cooks a seafood delicacy on a glacier. Grant pilots an incredibly fast racing boat.
